text: E fo, Benjaminɨn anabamɨn adarazir bar varazira mɨdorozimɨn ariaghirezir puvatɨ. Ezɨ e Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn akam akɨrigha ghaze, e uan guivitam isɨ me danɨngightɨ me an ikian kogham. Kamaghɨn, e manmaghɨn gumazir kaba bagh amizitaba inightɨ me dar ikiam? E kamaghɨn damutɨ, anabar kam bar kuavaremegham.”
